content.jd:
job_title : Full Stack Engineer - Team Lead



 
Stepping into the Team Lead - Full Stack Engineer role at Sense7ai, you'll be tasked with strategic leadership and hands-on development. Your role will translate ideas into tangible digital solutions, optimize the agile journey, and ensure excellence within an AWS-driven cloud ecosystem. 
 
Offshore Project Dynamics: 
Engage directly with an offshore client, requiring flexible working hours to align with IST or EST based on project demands. Embrace diverse work cultures, ensure synchronized deliverables, and maintain proactive communication to guarantee alignment with the client's vision, all while navigating time zone differences. 
 
Position Location: Open to Remote work.
 
Key Responsibilities: 
 
Technical Execution & Development: 
Solution Architecture: 

Direct the design and architecture of robust and scalable Mobile applications. 
Ensure that software design and implementation align with architectural guidelines and best practices. 

Hands-on Development: 

Lead in developing features and modules, employing technologies such as React, React Native, Typescript, JavaScript, Python. 
Ensure integration of solutions within the AWS landscape, utilizing services like Lambda and Dynamo DB effectively. 
Design features in adherence to healthcare standards and regulations. 
Collaborate with domain authorities to capture and actualize intricate requirements. 

Code Review & Quality Assurance: 

Conduct rigorous code reviews, emphasizing best practices and optimal performance. 
Oversee deployment strategies, ensuring efficient release and stability post-deployment. 

Problem Solving: 

Troubleshoot complex development challenges, offering innovative and efficient solutions. 
Champion the optimization and refinement of existing code to improve performance and maintainability. 

 
Team Leadership & Strategy: 
Team Development & Mentorship: 

Lead, mentor, and grow a team of developers, fostering an environment of continuous learning and innovation. 
Assess team skillsets and facilitate training sessions to bridge knowledge gaps. 

Project Oversight & Communication: 

Monitor multiple projects, ensuring adherence to timelines, scope, and quality benchmarks. 
Serve as a communication bridge between developers, stakeholders, and clients, ensuring transparency and clarity in project status and challenges. 

Technical Strategy & Vision: 

Shape the team’s technical strategy, aligning with the broader organizational goals. 
Stay abreast of industry trends, introducing innovative tools and methodologies to keep the team at the forefront of technology. 

Preferred Experience: 

7-10 years experience crafting large-scale software solutions. 
React Native: 3+ years 
React: 4+ years 
Python: 4+ years 
TypeScript: 3+ years 
JavaScript: 3+ years 
AWS (Serverless Architecture, Lambda, Dynamo DB): 4+ years 
Cumulative Industry Experience: 7+ years 

What's in It for You?  

Flexibility at its best 
Recharge with flexible vacation days. 
Comprehensive health insurance: Covers you, your family, and your parents. 

Ambitious leaders with a blend of technical prowess and strategic vision are invited to apply. Join Sense7ai in scripting tech chronicles of unparalleled excellence! 


Jd Skills : ANGULAR/REACT,React Native,IPYTHON,TYPESCRIPT,APPLESCRIPT/JAVASCRIPT,AMAZON (AWS) REDSHIFT.

JD Nice To Have : FLUTTER

Jd Location : Remote

Jd Qualifcation : Bachelors

Jd Experience : 7 - 10  years

job_title : Full Stack Engineer - Team Lead



 
Stepping into the Team Lead - Full Stack Engineer role at Sense7ai, you'll be tasked with strategic leadership and hands-on development. Your role will translate ideas into tangible digital solutions, optimize the agile journey, and ensure excellence within an AWS-driven cloud ecosystem. 
 
Offshore Project Dynamics: 
Engage directly with an offshore client, requiring flexible working hours to align with IST or EST based on project demands. Embrace diverse work cultures, ensure synchronized deliverables, and maintain proactive communication to guarantee alignment with the client's vision, all while navigating time zone differences. 
 
Position Location: Open to Remote work.
 
Key Responsibilities: 
 
Technical Execution & Development: 
Solution Architecture: 

Direct the design and architecture of robust and scalable Mobile applications. 
Ensure that software design and implementation align with architectural guidelines and best practices. 

Hands-on Development: 

Lead in developing features and modules, employing technologies such as React, React Native, Typescript, JavaScript, Python. 
Ensure integration of solutions within the AWS landscape, utilizing services like Lambda and Dynamo DB effectively. 
Design features in adherence to healthcare standards and regulations. 
Collaborate with domain authorities to capture and actualize intricate requirements. 

Code Review & Quality Assurance: 

Conduct rigorous code reviews, emphasizing best practices and optimal performance. 
Oversee deployment strategies, ensuring efficient release and stability post-deployment. 

Problem Solving: 

Troubleshoot complex development challenges, offering innovative and efficient solutions. 
Champion the optimization and refinement of existing code to improve performance and maintainability. 

 
Team Leadership & Strategy: 
Team Development & Mentorship: 

Lead, mentor, and grow a team of developers, fostering an environment of continuous learning and innovation. 
Assess team skillsets and facilitate training sessions to bridge knowledge gaps. 

Project Oversight & Communication: 

Monitor multiple projects, ensuring adherence to timelines, scope, and quality benchmarks. 
Serve as a communication bridge between developers, stakeholders, and clients, ensuring transparency and clarity in project status and challenges. 

Technical Strategy & Vision: 

Shape the team’s technical strategy, aligning with the broader organizational goals. 
Stay abreast of industry trends, introducing innovative tools and methodologies to keep the team at the forefront of technology. 

Preferred Experience: 

7-10 years experience crafting large-scale software solutions. 
React Native: 3+ years 
React: 4+ years 
Python: 4+ years 
TypeScript: 3+ years 
JavaScript: 3+ years 
AWS (Serverless Architecture, Lambda, Dynamo DB): 4+ years 
Cumulative Industry Experience: 7+ years 

What's in It for You?  

Flexibility at its best 
Recharge with flexible vacation days. 
Comprehensive health insurance: Covers you, your family, and your parents. 

Ambitious leaders with a blend of technical prowess and strategic vision are invited to apply. Join Sense7ai in scripting tech chronicles of unparalleled excellence!

content.jd:
job_title : Full Stack Engineer - Team Lead



 
Stepping into the Team Lead - Full Stack Engineer role at Sense7ai, you'll be tasked with strategic leadership and hands-on development. Your role will translate ideas into tangible digital solutions, optimize the agile journey, and ensure excellence within an AWS-driven cloud ecosystem. 
 
Offshore Project Dynamics: 
Engage directly with an offshore client, requiring flexible working hours to align with IST or EST based on project demands. Embrace diverse work cultures, ensure synchronized deliverables, and maintain proactive communication to guarantee alignment with the client's vision, all while navigating time zone differences. 
 
Position Location: Open to Remote work.
 
Key Responsibilities: 
 
Technical Execution & Development: 
Solution Architecture: 

Direct the design and architecture of robust and scalable Mobile applications. 
Ensure that software design and implementation align with architectural guidelines and best practices. 

Hands-on Development: 

Lead in developing features and modules, employing technologies such as React, React Native, Typescript, JavaScript, Python. 
Ensure integration of solutions within the AWS landscape, utilizing services like Lambda and Dynamo DB effectively. 
Design features in adherence to healthcare standards and regulations. 
Collaborate with domain authorities to capture and actualize intricate requirements. 

Code Review & Quality Assurance: 

Conduct rigorous code reviews, emphasizing best practices and optimal performance. 
Oversee deployment strategies, ensuring efficient release and stability post-deployment. 

Problem Solving: 

Troubleshoot complex development challenges, offering innovative and efficient solutions. 
Champion the optimization and refinement of existing code to improve performance and maintainability. 

 
Team Leadership & Strategy: 
Team Development & Mentorship: 

Lead, mentor, and grow a team of developers, fostering an environment of continuous learning and innovation. 
Assess team skillsets and facilitate training sessions to bridge knowledge gaps. 

Project Oversight & Communication: 

Monitor multiple projects, ensuring adherence to timelines, scope, and quality benchmarks. 
Serve as a communication bridge between developers, stakeholders, and clients, ensuring transparency and clarity in project status and challenges. 

Technical Strategy & Vision: 

Shape the team’s technical strategy, aligning with the broader organizational goals. 
Stay abreast of industry trends, introducing innovative tools and methodologies to keep the team at the forefront of technology. 

Preferred Experience: 

7-10 years experience crafting large-scale software solutions. 
React Native: 3+ years 
React: 4+ years 
Python: 4+ years 
TypeScript: 3+ years 
JavaScript: 3+ years 
AWS (Serverless Architecture, Lambda, Dynamo DB): 4+ years 
Cumulative Industry Experience: 7+ years 

What's in It for You?  

Flexibility at its best 
Recharge with flexible vacation days. 
Comprehensive health insurance: Covers you, your family, and your parents. 

Ambitious leaders with a blend of technical prowess and strategic vision are invited to apply. Join Sense7ai in scripting tech chronicles of unparalleled excellence! 


Jd Skills : ANGULAR/REACT,React Native,IPYTHON,TYPESCRIPT,APPLESCRIPT/JAVASCRIPT,AMAZON (AWS) REDSHIFT.

JD Nice To Have : FLUTTER

Jd Location : Remote

Jd Qualifcation : Bachelors

Jd Experience : 7 - 10  years

job_title : HR Manager / Recruitment Lead

Join Our Team at Sense7ai
At Sense7ai, we are committed to driving sustainable innovation and revolutionizing business operations with our cutting-edge software solutions. As a market leader in intelligent software product development, we specialize in empowering businesses with the tools they need to thrive in a dynamic digital landscape.
What We Offer:

A collaborative environment where creativity meets strategy, producing software solutions optimized for maximum impact.
A diverse portfolio of purpose-built software solutions, backed by case studies demonstrating our expertise in web application development and more.
A commitment to staying ahead of the curve with our software offerings, harnessing the power of AI and ML to deliver optimized services.

Why Sense7ai?

You'll be part of a team that values innovation and is passionate about making a real difference in the way businesses operate.
We offer opportunities to grow and learn within a supportive and dynamic workplace.
Our approach is holistic — we believe in nurturing both individual talent and collective success.

We're Looking For:

Innovative thinkers who are eager to contribute to developing next-generation software solutions.
Professionals with a knack for problem-solving and a passion for technology.
Team players who thrive in a fast-paced environment and are dedicated to delivering excellence.
